about_the_game: Wasted Shot is a open world VR game inspired by GTA. It Currently features in game shops, cops, drivable vehicles, an AI vehicle traffic system, unlockable weapon upgrades, melee combat, customizable player character and pedestrians. As well as physics based weapons. In this game you can explorer an open world map, car jack vehicles, attack pedestrians with physics based combat mechanics. Your characters body collides with the in world characters and objects. You can do randomized side jobs for money or complete main campaign missions. You can spend your in game money on guns, gun upgrades, clothes, or hairstyles. The gameplay mostly consists of the player either messing around in the open world or completing story objectives. The full in game campaign is currently incomplete.

content_descriptors.notes: In this game the player has the ability to violently attack NPC's  and even dismember their limbs with certain weapons. There is are also voice lines form NPC's that have curse words in them. The player also can commit in game crimes sometimes involving illegal drugs.
